javelin.model.world

Class Portal

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldPlace
      • javelin.model.world.Portal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldActor

    public class Portal
extends WorldPlace
    Portals usually take a Squad from a place to another. TODO Lots of good ideas here http://www.campaignmastery.com/blog/portals-to-celest-morph-1/ TODO would be cool to have a portal feature that drops you on a wider area
    Author:
    alex
